description: Primes p such that x^3 = 10 has a solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A040058 relative to A000040. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 13 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok [p_]:=Reduce[Mod[x^3 - 10, p] == 0, x, Integers] =!= False;  Select[Prime[Range[180]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 11 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(450) | exists(t){x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^3 eq 10}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 11 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
